translations: adj.以前的，先前的；（时间或顺序上）稍前的；<非正式>过早的，过急的
n.<英，非正式>前科，犯罪记录

phrs.translation: 上一页，前一页；返回上一级菜单
（国会议事程序中作为动议提出的）先决问题

sentences.sentence: Her previous calm gave way to terror.
sentences.translation: 她先前的泰然自若已变为惊恐。

sentences.sentence: The car has only had one previous owner.
sentences.translation: 这辆汽车以前没换过车主。

sentences.sentence: Previous to this, she'd always been well.
sentences.translation: 这以前，她身体一向很好。
